channel.title: Chars rights?
channel.description: how do you make someone become a mod,admin,or owner?

item.title: Chars rights?
item.dc:creator: @Sephiroth1 Sephiroth~
item.description:
@Sephiroth1 wrote:

skullsy:

ok u cant change player rights on testscape so if u have that i suggest a dif source (i chose cheezscape, but u basically have to mod everything be4 anyone things ur server is good.)

the hell are you on about? you can change player rights on every source, but some sources you have to change it via client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Chars rights?
item.dc:creator: @dc_chemicals dc_chemicals
item.description:
@dc_chemicals wrote:

Ok first you have to have the downloaded mopar scape file and a source like pimpscape or p16 or test scape<â€“(examples) Or any other scape you like and then you go to the source file and open it and go to data and go to administartators moderators or staff and type in the players name correctly if you dont it dont work if you do not have the downloaded version of moparscape go to downloads and go to the topic that says moparscape 3.2 hosted by moparisthebest and if you want a source ask some one on here the will give u one or maybe on the other sections of this forum cause im not sure asking for sources is help. Ok there ya go!! big thanks to me
